title: Gorchymyn bod tyst yn mynychu i roi tystiolaeth

content.text: Gallwch ofyn i'r tribiwnlys orchymyn bod tyst yn mynychu i roi tystiolaeth.
Rhaid i’r tyst fod ym Mhrydain Fawr (Cymru, Lloegr a’r Alban). Nid yw hyn yn cynnwys Gogledd Iwerddon.
Gall y tribiwnlys gyfyngu ar nifer y tystion y gellir eu galw i roi tystiolaeth ar fater penodol, yn enwedig os nad yw'r mater hwnnw yn ganolog i'r achos.
Efallai y bydd yr atebydd hefyd yn gyfrifol am dalu costau'r tyst.
Dylech ystyried a yw tystiolaeth y tyst hwn yn debygol o helpu eich achos.
Manylion i’w cynnwys yn eich cais:

items: the witness’s full name and address

why the attendance of this witness is necessary for a fair hearing. The tribunal needs to understand why the evidence is relevant, and why there is no alternative way of establishing the same points at the hearing without ordering a witness to attend
if you have asked this witness to attend voluntarily. If you have, tell us when you asked and what their response was
if you have not asked the witness to attend yet, explain why

content.text: Os bydd y gorchymyn yn cael ei ganiatáu, bydd y tyst yn cael ei orchymyn i fod yn bresennol ar ddiwrnod cyntaf y gwrandawiad. Os ydych chi eisiau iddo fynychu ar ddiwrnod arall neu ddiwrnodau eraill, dywedwch wrthym:

items: the dates apart from the first day of the hearing that you want the witness to attend
why their attendance is necessary on those dates

content.text: Os ydych chi eisiau i’r tyst ddod â dogfennau efo nhw, dywedwch wrthym:

items: why these documents are relevant to the issues in this case
why an order to disclose the documents would not be enough
if you have already asked the witness or anyone else to provide these documents. If you have, tell us when you asked and what their response was
if you have not asked the witness to provide the documents yet, explain why
